credential-id.label: Credential ID
credential-id.helper_text: Unique identifier of your passkey. You might be able to find this passkey by Credential ID in your password manager.

last-login-date.label: Last login date
last-login-date.helper_text: The last time this passkey was used to sign in to your Foxy Account.

last-login-ua.label: Last browser
last-login-ua.helper_text: User agent string of the browser that was last used to sign in to your Foxy Account with this passkey.

delete.delete_prompt: Once deleted, this passkey will no longer be accepted on login but will remain in your password manager. Sessions created with this passkey will stay active.
